summary: This document is an email from Jeffrey Epstein to Jes Staley, dated December 12, 2009. The email discusses confidential information and includes a link to an article. It emphasizes the confidentiality and potential attorney-client privilege of the communication.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Jeffrey Epstein is the sender of the email, indicating the communication is confidential and may be privileged.

persons.name: Jes Staley
persons.context: Jes Staley is the recipient of the email, which contains confidential information intended for his use.

connections.description: The email suggests a relationship where Epstein is sharing potentially privileged information with Staley.

keyFacts: The email emphasizes confidentiality and potential attorney-client privilege.
The communication is intended only for the use of Jes Staley.
There is a link to an article included in the email.
